name: .^^^ File Extension
summary: Learn about .^^^ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Database file used by Pervasive.SQL database software; based on the Btrieve transactional database format; created by the database engine when the database is placed in Continuous Operations mode.

content: The Pervasive.SQL program was renamed Pervasive PSQL starting with version 9.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
